linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Athlon X4 740
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) or Radeon R9 285 (2 GB)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel i5 Gen 5 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14.x
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Video RAM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Athlon X4 740
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) or Radeon R9 285 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 Gen 5 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
